column4: is it possible that my linux instalation (from an alterantive install) fails because the swap partion is too big?
I dunno a lot bout swap but I think that if you have enough ram (let's say 1ghz) you won't need the swap at all
if you dunno how much swap to  have why don't you let the system choose? I think livecd does it quite well ,no?
i know how much swap, A LOT :)
